info.description: A comprehensive REST API for baseball statistics serving data from the Lahman Baseball Database and Retrosheet
info.title: Baseball API

get.description: List all baseball franchises with optional active filter
Get details for a specific franchise
Search and browse games with optional filters and pagination
Get detailed information for a specific game
Search and browse players with optional name filter and pagination
Get detailed biographical information for a specific player
Get all awards won by a player
Get Hall of Fame voting records for a player
get.summary: Get player Hall of Fame records

get.description: Get season-by-season batting and pitching statistics for a player
Get all games played on a specific date
Get season batting leaders for a specific statistic

parameters.description: Statistic (hr, avg, rbi, sb, h, r)
parameters.name: stat

get.description: Get season pitching leaders for a specific statistic
Get all games for a specific season
List all teams that played in a specific season
get.summary: Get all teams for a season

get.description: Get all games for a specific team in a season
get.summary: Get team games for a season

get.description: Flexible batting stats query with multiple filter options

parameters.description: Sort by stat (avg, hr, rbi, sb, h, r)
parameters.name: sort_by

get.description: Flexible pitching stats query with multiple filter options

parameters.description: Sort by stat (era, w, so, sv, ip)
parameters.name: sort_by

get.description: List team seasons with optional year and league filters
